dialog.speaker: Peter
dialog.message: Hey i need you to fix my internet connection.There is a big problem, it says error 404 and something about DNS not working

dialog.speaker: Karen
dialog.message: Yeah, same. My connection is spotty and i can not watch netflix, do something about it

dialog.speaker: Peter
dialog.message: Hi karen, what that IT guy did actually worked, but now it seems like our database has been wiped, do you know why?

dialog.speaker: Karen
dialog.message: WHAAAAATT???!!!! That is impossible, I am going to ask the manager about it

dialog.speaker: Karen
dialog.message: Hi Carol, do you know what happened to our database?

dialog.speaker: Carol
dialog.message: Yep, it seems like we've got hacked. Someone has stolen all the info and now is asking for money to hand it back.

dialog.speaker: Karen
dialog.message: And how did they got into the system? I am the only one with the password...

test.question: What should you do?
test.b: Turn airplane mode on and off
test.c: Check if there is a hole in his computer
test.d: Throw his laptop throught the window

test.question: What is the breaching point in the system?
test.b: The fact that the password was 1234
test.c: The password was written on a post-it in plain sight
test.d: The lack of end to end endcription

dialog.speaker: Gary
dialog.dialog: Yoooooooo internet is down again fix it please
